resources.string: Without repeating, the sum of each ellipse should equal 6 or 7.
Without repeating, the sum of each circle must be equal to 6 or 7.
Without repeating, the sum of each heart must be equal to 10 or 11 or 12.
Without repeating, the sum of each triangle must equal 8 or 9 or 10.
Without repeating, the sum of each row should equal 6 or 7.
Without repeating, the sum of each arc shall be equal to 8 or 9 or 10.
Without repeating, the sum of each circle must be equal to 8 or 9 or 10.
Without repeating, the sum of each circle must be equal to 6 or 7.
Without repeating, the sum of each square must be equal to 12 or 13 or 14 or 15 or 16.
Without repeating, the sum of each face of the cube should be equal to 13 or 14 or 15 or 16 or 17 or 18 or 19.
